Package com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.geom

Contains all geometry related classes including points, vertices, triangles, flat and spherical geometries and the meshes and terrains that are built out of them.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BufferedElement Interface for classes that store arrays of elements in NIO buffers
Geometry Interface for the geometry classes to implement
Triangle Interface to be implemented by triangle objects
TriangleArray Interface for objects that handle a triangle array
TriangleMesh The interface that meshes must implement
Vertex Interface that must be implemented by objects that represent vertices.
VertexArray Interface for vertex array objects
XYZ Interface for XYZ objects
 

Class Summary
AbstractGeometry An abstract base class for all the geometry stuff.
AbstractTriangleMesh Contains vertices and triangles of a triangles mesh.
FlatGeometry Concrete class providing a flat geometry (in the XY-plane, with Z up).
ImmutableXYZ Class for XYZ values that can't be modified after creation.
Matrix33 Class to hold 3x3 matrices
Matrix34 Class to hold 3x4 matrices
MeshUtils Utility code related to meshes
RandomXYZInBox Class that extends XYZ and generates random points in a bounding box
RandomXYZInSphere Generates random points in or on a unit sphere (origin centred)
RandomXYZSphereNormal Creates random points normal to a sphere
SimpleTriangle Class to hold triangles.
SimpleVertex Represents one vertex.
SimpleXYZ Represents a 3D coordinate
SphericalGeometry Class implementing a spherical geometry.
TriangleBufferArray Implements an array of triangles using a buffer that can be passed directly to rendering.
TriangleEdge Class to store triangle edges.
TriangleMeshCloud A mesh used to represent a cloud layer
TriangleMeshCloudFlat A mesh class for clouds using a flat geometry
TriangleMeshCloudPlanet Class that represents a spherical cloud layer
TriangleMeshFlat A mesh representing a flat terrain.
TriangleMeshIcosahedron An icosahedron.
TriangleMeshSubdividedIcosahedron A subdivided Isocahedron
TriangleMeshTerrain This class holds all the terrain-related methods.
TriangleMeshTerrainFlat A flat terrain class
TriangleMeshTerrainPlanet Terrain mesh for a planet
VertexBufferArray Vertex data stored in an byte buffers.
XYZMath Factored the operations on XYZ out to here so classes that implement XYZ don't have to duplicate them all.
 

Enum Summary
TriangleMeshFlat.FlatTerrainType An enum that represents the different types of terrain this class can create
 

Package com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.geom Description

Contains all geometry related classes including points, vertices, triangles, flat and spherical geometries and the meshes and terrains that are built out of them. Also includes code for vector math operations. Includes a simple bean implemenation of meshes and one with storage in nio ByteBuffer objects for efficient use with OpenGL indexed operations.
